title: Thunderbird 102.14.0 e-mails to gmail accounts are getting rejected because authentification failed
content: I have tried to follow the instructions to set the Authentification method to outgoing SMTP to OAuth2, but there was no such option on my Thunderbird. I then set the Authentification method to "Password, transmitted insecurely", but then Thunderbird produced a window saying, "login to account 'outgoing SMTP' failed" and telling me "Login to server mail.whiteboxtechnologies.com with username yjhuang@whiteboxtechnologies.com failed" and to either Retry, Enter New Password, or Cancel. All passwords I tried were rejected. How can I either set the Authentification method to OAuth2, or enter the correct password? Are there cookies that I need to clear out ?
creator: joehuang

title: PCV profile import to Thunderbird from MozBackup
content: I have reinstalled a profile that was backed up on MozBackup as a .pcv file. This displays the contents of each email folder. However, when I click on most of the individual email messages, most of them have no data: I can see sender, subject, date/time, but not the actual message.
creator: evanvwk
